analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/10/0x5b53f9755f82439cba66007ec7073c59e0da4a7d.sol:
	Contract FlowchainToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0x5b53f9755f82439cba66007ec7073c59e0da4a7d.sol#117-118)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

FlowchainToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x5b53f9755f82439cba66007ec7073c59e0da4a7d.sol#111)
FlowchainToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x5b53f9755f82439cba66007ec7073c59e0da4a7d.sol#108-109)
FlowchainToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x5b53f9755f82439cba66007ec7073c59e0da4a7d.sol#110)
FlowchainToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x5b53f9755f82439cba66007ec7073c59e0da4a7d.sol#112-114)
